mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH, M.MEMBER_STATUS, A.ARTIST_BLOG_NAME, A.ARTIST_DESCRIPTION, A.BLOG_IMG_NAME, A.BLOG_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_ARTIST A on M.ID = A.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.ID = #{id}

SELECT MEMBER_ID, ARTIST_BLOG_NAME, BLOG_IMG_NAME, BLOG_IMG_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(S.ARTIST_ID) FROM TBL_SUBSCRIPTION S WHERE S.ARTIST_ID = A.MEMBER_ID) AS SUBSCRIPTION_COUNT FROM TBL_ARTIST A WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
